name: Tattorn Football Manager 3d
description:
Tattorn Football manager or Football Manager 2 is a football manager game where the player gets to manage a football/ soccer team and try to reach glory by winning leagues and  trophies, with a 3d match engine, the game has 146 national teams, all playable, 4 leagues , 96 clubs and a database of 8000 players.  It is the successor to the older Tattorn Football manager game.

This game is  made as an alternative to the Football manager series by SI games and unlike the  game by SI games, this game does not cheat and is not rigged or scripted, so the player gets a fair chance of success proportionate to the effort put.

The aim of the game is for the player to try reach success and win as many trophies as they can, and try to win more throphies than any other manager and reach the top of the world in the football manager career. Or the player can decide on whatever level of success they so desire.  This is not a typical football game so you can't  control the players directly, but you can set tactics and give your players instructions to try win matches, even on the pitch. 

As an indie developed game, this is one of the very few alternatives to Football Manager, and probably the only one will all playable national teams. The game is not as indepth and complex as the real Football manager series, otherwise it would be a very huge project, and this was already a big complex project,  but it has enough features for a solid manager.
